text:
Do not mess with Jennifer Aniston’s man.

The scorned ex-Mrs. Theroux is calling on every single member of Team Aniston to squash Emma Stone, after flying into a furious rage over her romance with her ex-husband Justin Theroux.

As RadarOnline.com previously reported, Theroux and Stone have been jetting all over the world together, a relationship that is driving his ex-wife crazy.

“It bugs the hell out of Jen that Justin got close to Emma during their marriage and she isn’t taking this lying down,” a source close to the Friends star told RadarOnline.com.
title: Jen’s Rage: Aniston In 'Revenge Mode' Against Emma After She’s Caught With Justin

meta_data.description: Jennifer Aniston “in revenge mode” against Emma Stone and Justin Theroux RadarOnline.com exclusively learned.
